item.title: A dashboard to assess occupational safety and health
item.description: The solution proposed was a single-page application that allowed you to create questionnaires that generated instant visualizations and dashboards. FrontEnd The React, Redux, Typescript combo was used to take advantage of composability and to get rid of the problems that were caused by a lack of type-safety in previous projects. I opted for Semantic-UI instead of Bootstrap to get a more polished look. I also continued to work with Nir Kaufman’s design patterns , ditching react-thunk in favor of middlewares.
